original_text: And they of the circumcision which believed were astonished, as many as came with Peter, because that on the Gentiles also was poured out the gift of the Holy Ghost.
korean_text: 베드로와 함께 온 할례 받은 신자들이 이방인들에게도 성령 부어 주심으로 말미암아 놀라니

sentences.original_text: And they of the circumcision which believed
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 할례를 받은 자 중에 믿는 자들은

sentences.original_text: as many as came with Peter
because that on the Gentiles also
was poured out the gift of the Holy Ghost
